titles.title: Pregnancy Assistance Act of 2020
Pregnancy Assistance Act of 2020
To reauthorize the Pregnancy Assistance Fund.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and Labor.

bill.summary: Pregnancy Assistance Act of 2020 This bill reauthorizes through FY2025 the Pregnancy Assistance Fund program, which awards grants to states for a range of support services for expectant and parenting teens, women, fathers, and their families. Such services include those related to personal health, child health, parenting, education, and employment.
